TopicTitle: Transfering cfg file for key bindingand joystick assignments to newest version.

Articles.Content:
I prefer to fly using a joystick and getting everything set the way I like it was a chore. I'd prefer not to have to do it again.

Is it possible to transfer the joystick settings to 0.20.1? (from 0.19.1 )

If so which cfg file would I need to move and is there anything i would need to change?
